import { useRef } from 'react' import React from 'react' import './Checkout.css' const Checkout = (props) => { const nameInput = useRef(); const streetInput = useRef(); const postalInput = useRef(); const cityInput = useRef(); const confirmHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const enteredName = nameInput.current.value; } return
} export default Checkout
